channel.title: Can someone help pleeease
channel.description:
can someone help please look
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img355.imageshack.us/img355/2181/helppl0xqt2.jpg[/img][/URL]
and this is what it says if u cant see that
[code]Starting ~~ on 0.0.0.0:43594 M U Z I K has joined the game (127.0.0.1) M U Z I K: error writing file. java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\connectedfrom\M U Z I K.txt (The system cann ot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.appendConnected(Unknown Source) at client.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) M U Z I K: error writing file. _ disconnected. [/code]
someone help pleease?? :confused:

item.title: Can someone help pleeease
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Add a folder called Data. Within that folder, add a folder called connectedFrom. If you have that folder, add it to the data folder. and Vise versa. Then create a .txt file called M U Z I K.txt

Read full topic

and named it characters.
then i made a _.txt thing with this in it
